snippet: Dominique McWilliams has had several stints in the criminal justice, but now out on parole, she is working toward becoming a veterinarian.
abstract: Brooklyn Community Services, one of seven agencies supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, helps Dominique McWilliams buy textbooks and school supplies for her classes at Borough of Manhattan Community College.
lead_paragraph: Dominique McWilliams has had several stints in the criminal justice, but now out on parole, she is working toward becoming a veterinarian.

headline.print_headline: Out of Prison, a Woman Hopes to Make the Most of Her Freedom
headline.main: Out of Prison, a Brooklyn Woman Hopes for a New Start

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: New York Times Neediest Cases Fund
